attributes.action: immediately remove the power of Mr Speaker to halt or veto any internal or external investigation into the way taxpayer funded tax free expenses are used by elected and unelected persons in the Palace of Westminster.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No one person, especially one who has obvious interests in keeping hidden from the electorate what is going on in the matter of the use of taxpayer funded tax-free allowances by elected and appointed members of both Houses, should be allowed to have the power of veto over investigation into these matters.  It is obvious to all that it is a monumental conflict of interest and an abuse of power to prevent disclosure of the information to the people who are themselves unable to access tax-free allowances to the same extent, despite that they have to bear the cost of providing them to some 650 people who would rather not divulge how they are using the money.

rejection.details: This is a metter for the House authorities. Please contact Parliament directly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
